description: This Python script demonstrates how to create and use an AI agent for image generation with DALL-E, including setting up the agent, providing example prompts, and retrieving generated images.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that can perform tasks such as image generation, with configurable models and tools.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent’s response to a given prompt, optionally streaming the output.

methods.name: get_images
methods.description: Retrieves images generated by the agent.
